name: Spearphishing Attachment
description: Adversaries may use a spearphishing attachment, a variant of spearphishing, as a form of a social engineering attack against specific targets. Spearphishing attachments are different from other forms of spearphishing in that they employ malware attached to an email. All forms of spearphishing are electronically delivered and target a specific individual, company, or industry. In this scenario, adversaries attach a file to the spearphishing email and usually rely upon User Execution to gain execution and access. (Citation: EAttack Spearphishing Attachment) Data Sources: File monitoring, Packet capture, Network intrusion detection system, Detonation chamber, Email gateway, Mail server

external_references.description: Enterprise ATT&CK. (2019, October 25). Spearphishing Attachment. Retrieved October 25, 2019.
